title: Multilingual Short Works Collection 034 - Poetry & Prose
description:
This is our 34th collection of short pieces, poetry or prose, fiction and non-fiction, in several different languages (except standard English) as listed below. All chosen and recorded by Librivox volunteers. - Summary by ToddHW

1. Catalan - Joan Garí - 1:43
Joan Maragall
Link to text
Keywords: visió, frare, muntanya, vision, friar, mountain

2. Catalan - El mal caçador - 2:45
Joan Maragall
Link to text
Keywords: visió, caçador, missa, vision, hunter, mass

3. Finnish - Mies - 9:08
Alexis Kivi
Link to text
Keywords: Man, divorce, rural, thunder, hope, lifestory

4. French - La chaîne d'or - 22:57
Léon-Pamphile Le May
Link to text
